page.title: 16BURROW'S FARM,CLIFTON.
page.content: The farm is owned by Mr and Mrs Marshall,their son and daughter-in- law.Nowadays young{Mr and Mrs Marshall work the farm together with one farmhand and a girl who looks after the horses and ponies.The Marshalls have been working the farm for thirty years.They used to work for{Colonel {Clifton}who owned much of the land.The farm has twenty-nine horses and ponies and forty-nine beef cattle.There are also some free range chickens and a twenty-two year old stallion"SODA". They have four ploughs and four tractors,three are Zetors(a foreign make)and the other is a Ferguson.They also have a baler,a cutter and a hay bob which fluffs it all up for drying. There are fields of rough grass for grazing also barley,potatoes,hay and fodder beef.This is for the cattle in winter.
